      boolean Game.canDoPlayerUseYearOfPlenty(ResourceType[] resourceType, int userID)
      This card is special because it is the only development card that references the bank, so additional checks need to be made, and so for security reasons it gets its own method to do so.
      boolean Game.canTradeResourcesToBank(ResourceType resourceType)
      Does the player have cards to trade?
      void Game.discardNumberOfResourceType(int UserId, int numberToDiscard, ResourceType resourceType)
      The Specified Player will discard the specified number of Resource Cards back to the bank from his hand
      void Game.doMaritimeTrade(ResourceType tradeIn, ResourceType receive)
      This method does the actual trade by interacting with the bank and the Current Player to ascertain the port type and what if they can trade or not.

      int Game.getTradeRate(ResourceType resourceType)
      This method returns a 3, 4, or 2 depending on the port type you have, if any.
      ResourceCard Bank.playerTakeResource(ResourceType check)
